oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A nonlocal stochastic Cahn-Hilliard equation
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Cornalba, Federico
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Probability
Mathematics - Analysis of PDEs
60H15, 35R60
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We consider a stochastic extension of the nonlocal convective Cahn-Hilliard equation containing an additive Wiener process noise. We first introduce a suitable analytical setting and make some mathematical and physical assumptions. We then establish, in a variational context, the existence of a weak statistical solution for this problem. Finally we prove existence and uniqueness of a strong solution.
